reviews.review: Dr. Johnson's lectures are engaging and insightful. She makes complex topics easy to understand.
reviews.subject: Physics

reviews.review: Prof. Thompson is knowledgeable but often goes off-topic. His grading can be quite strict.
reviews.subject: Mathematics

reviews.review: Dr. Lee is very approachable and always willing to help outside of class. Her assignments are challenging but fair.
reviews.subject: Computer Science

reviews.review: Dr. Smith's lectures are dry and monotonous. The course materials are outdated.
reviews.subject: History

reviews.review: Prof. Carter has a great teaching style and is very enthusiastic about the subject. The exams are quite difficult.
reviews.subject: Literature

reviews.review: Dr. Brown is very knowledgeable but can be difficult to follow. Office hours are often packed.
reviews.subject: Biology

reviews.review: Prof. Adams is engaging and uses a lot of real-world examples. Her grading is lenient.
reviews.subject: Economics

reviews.review: Dr. Wilson's lectures are well-organized, but he can be very critical of student work.
reviews.subject: Chemistry

reviews.review: Prof. Martinez is passionate about the subject and creates a very interactive classroom environment.
reviews.subject: Sociology

reviews.review: Dr. Taylor's course was interesting but his feedback on assignments was minimal.
reviews.subject: Philosophy

reviews.review: Prof. Scott is highly organized and provides clear instructions, but her pace is very fast.
reviews.subject: Art History

reviews.review: Dr. Clark is very approachable and provides a lot of extra resources for students.
reviews.subject: Political Science

reviews.review: Prof. Lewis is excellent at explaining concepts, though her exams are quite challenging.
reviews.subject: Statistics

reviews.review: Dr. Hall's lectures are often disorganized and he tends to rush through the material.
reviews.subject: Engineering

reviews.review: Prof. Allen is very supportive and encourages student participation, but her grading can be inconsistent.
reviews.subject: Psychology

reviews.review: Dr. Young is a fantastic lecturer and very knowledgeable, but her course workload is heavy.
reviews.subject: Anthropology

reviews.review: Prof. Harris is approachable and provides good feedback, but the class is often too slow-paced.
reviews.subject: Business

reviews.review: Dr. Robinson's classes are lively and engaging. She has a great ability to make the material relatable.
reviews.subject: Music

reviews.review: Prof. Walker's lectures are clear and well-structured, but he sometimes provides little context for the material.
reviews.subject: Engineering

reviews.review: Dr. Green is very passionate about her subject, though her exams can be quite difficult.
reviews.subject: Geography

reviews.review: Prof. Adams is very knowledgeable but tends to lecture in a monotonous tone. Could benefit from more interaction.
reviews.subject: Theology
